actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-301.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 277 - 139 (Record Vote No: 353).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1562) to achieve the objectives of the Multi-Fiber Arrangement and to promote the economic recovery of the United States textile and apparel industry and its workers.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1562 (textile imports).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1562) to achieve the objectives of the Multi-Fiber Arrangement and to promote the economic recovery of the United States textile and apparel industry and its workers.
